Schedule

You can now download the schedule via a mobile app. Browse to the website on your mobile device and then click the link below, or download the Yapp app from the your devices App Store and search for the app on Yapp called THUNDER. Click here: http://my.yapp.us/THUNDER This has schedule, full class descriptions, presenter bios, vendors, staff and chat features for general chat about Thunder and separate sections to get some play dates lined up.

06:00 PM - 07:00 PM

Colorado TNG Meet and Mix

Come and meet your fellow TNG'ers and make some new friends. Everyone aged 18-35 welcome.

Breckenridge

Friday

06:15 PM - 09:00 PM

Meet & Greet Party

Meet all the Thunder presenters and staff---and for the first time at Thunder. Schmooze with old friends. Meet new ones! It is important for all new members to attend this event. Doors open at 6:15pm, it will begin promptly at 7pm. So don’t be late!

*** Stefanos and Shay hosting - Kick off your Thunder with an energetic, interactive, entertaining and informative orientation presented by Stefanos, Shay, and other guests from our stellar presenter line-up! This session is especially recommended for dungeon first-timers, covering everything from exhibitionist etiquette to flirting tips to common dungeon missteps. A generous sprinkling of psychological science and sexy and silly demos mean that even experienced kinksters will come away with new insights!

Cash bar will be available

Convention Room E

Friday

10:00 PM - 12:00 AM

Howl at the Moon - Calling all pups!

Puppies in the Mountains teams up with Thunder in the Mountains to host a puppy mosh pit on Friday night at from 10pm to Midnight! Come howl with us! We will have toys, volunteer handlers, and fruit snacks to share. Bring a list of your known allergies so we can be safe, gear up and pup out until midnight. Everyone is welcome to participate or watch

Copper Mountain

Talent Show

Thunder is bringing back our successful talent show for all interested attendees. Bring your scene work, singing, dancing, and any other talents to the stage and compete for cash prizes. 1st place $300 cash prize; 2nd place $200 cash prize; 3rd place $100 cash prize. This will be a great show. Everyone should try and attend!
